original_title: Aspects of Kirkwall No. 5: The Look of the Place
overview: A tour around Kirkwall, covering the years 1969 - 1976. Places featured include St Magnus Cathedral, Kirkwall harbour, Victoria St, Broad St, Kirkwall Grammar School (at School Place), dumping in the Peedie Sea.
title: Aspects of Kirkwall No. 5: The Look of the Place
